events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your experience and skills in software development.
A recruiter has been assigned to your candidacy to guide you through the hiring process and answer any questions you may have.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background and assess your fit for the software engineering role.
Thank you for your timely response and enthusiasm about proceeding to the next step in our technical interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for next Monday at 10 AM, where you'll be evaluated on your software engineering skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong problem-solving abilities relevant to the engineering role.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for Thursday at 3 PM to discuss work culture, benefits, and other non-technical topics.
You successfully completed the HR interview, displaying excellent communication skills and alignment with company values.
We are excited to extend a formal job offer to you for the Software Engineer position, including salary and benefits details.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
You have accepted the job offer, confirming your intent to join us as a Software Engineer and begin your employment soon.
Your onboarding process has started, including orientation sessions and systems setup to welcome you to our engineering team.
The hiring process has been successfully closed, and you are now officially part of our engineering department as a new team member.
